original_title: Christina Aguilera: Live At LadyLand Festival
overview: GRAMMYÂ® award-winning global superstar, singer, songwriter, Christina Aguilera, announced her LadyLand 2021 headlining performance streaming via the premium social live media platform Moment House, November 30th.  Filmed at the iconic Brooklyn Mirage at the annual LadyLand music festival celebrating some of the very best of queer talent & gay icons, Aguilera brought the complete live experience to fans around the world who weren't able to see this performance in person.
tagline: Christina Aguilera - Live At LadyLand Festival
title: Christina Aguilera: Live At LadyLand Festival
